results.title: Customer Sales Merchandiser
results.description: Marketing and processing everyday essential merchandise to consumers via online media and/or through retail literature.Team Leader opportunities available for incomes that exceed £25k per annum. Flexible hours requiring the ability to work on your own initiative with training provided.

We are currently recruiting for a few customer service representatives and managers who are looking for either part-time or full-time roles.The roles include promoting product merchandise through online media and other online selling tools, and/or utilisting promotional literature to customers in the local area. Working with well known recognised household brands.Opportunities to progress to executive and management levels for the ambitious. Training fully provided for all roles.
